text:
ExecVision | Arlington, VA | Remote | http://execvision.io

ExecVision is one of the leading conversation analytics startups, and is seeking frontend-oriented full stack engineers to join the product team. If you love react js, python or java, and sql, this could be a good opportunity for you.

See full job description here: https://www.execvision.io/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/Softwar...
